hooks.command: powershell -Command "$file = $env:STDIN_JSON | ConvertFrom-Json | Select-Object -ExpandProperty tool_input | Select-Object -ExpandProperty file_path; if ($file -match '\.(js|jsx|ts|tsx)$') { npx prettier --write $file }"

powershell -Command "$file = $env:STDIN_JSON | ConvertFrom-Json | Select-Object -ExpandProperty tool_input | Select-Object -ExpandProperty file_path; if ($file -match '\.(ts|tsx)$' -and $file -notmatch '\.test\.' -and $file -notmatch '\.spec\.') { $result = npx tsc --noEmit 2>&1; if ($LASTEXITCODE -ne 0) { Write-Error 'TypeScript errors found'; exit 2 } }"

powershell -Command "if (Test-Path package.json) { $changed = git diff --name-only --diff-filter=ACMR | Where-Object { $_ -match '\.(js|jsx|ts|tsx)$' }; if ($changed) { Write-Host 'Running linter on changed files...'; npx eslint $changed } }"
